name: Jet Access Flight Training
about: Jet Access Flight Training is a premier aviation education provider, offering world-class training through certified instructors and modern, technically advanced aircraft. Established in 2003, we are a part 61 and part 141-approved flight training program with a reputation for affordability and reliability. Our training locations span across the U.S., including sites in Indiana, Ohio, Tennessee, and Illinois. We cater to various career paths and personal flying goals, providing flexible and accelerated programs, including university-affiliated degrees and financing options. Our focus is on customer service, pricing transparency, and ensuring students achieve their full potential as pilots. With a 100% job placement record for commercial graduates, we are committed to nurturing a passion for flight and preparing students for successful careers in aviation.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating"]
